FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: What globally unique, persistent, resolvable identifiers do you use for metadata records?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: We don't have explicit PIDs for metadata records at the moment but are exploring options.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: What globally unique, persistent, resolvable identifiers do you use for datasets?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: ePIC implementation considered for ELN documents. | DOIs are available for dataset exports via third party services, direct implementation considered for ELN documents.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which metadata schemas do you use for findability?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: DataCite Schema 4.5 is planned, web-based schemas are explored.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: What is the technology that links the persistent identifiers of your data to the metadata description?
In which search engines are your metadata records indexed?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Published pages can be indexed by webcrawlers.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: In which search engines are your datasets indexed?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Published pages can be indexed by webcrawlers.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which standardized communication protocol do you use for metadata records?
Which standardized communication protocol do you use for datasets?
Which authentication & authorisation technique do you use for metadata records?
Which authentication & authorisation technique do you use for datasets?
Which metadata longevity plan do you use?
Which knowledge representation languages (allowing machine interoperation) do you use for metadata records?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: As part of general RO-Crate support (https://www.researchobject.org/ro-crate/).

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which knowledge representation languages (allowing machine interoperation) do you use for datasets?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: As part of general RO-Crate support (https://www.researchobject.org/ro-crate/).

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which structured vocabularies do you use to annotate your metadata records?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: RSpace users can create or import custom controlled vocabularies/ontologies. Controlled vocabularies/ontologies can be employed as tags on the document level. See: https://documentation.researchspace.com/article/8ujmvpa1no-tagging-documents#controlled_vocabularies_ontologies. Users can also directly use terms from BioPortal ontologies through an integration.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which structured vocabularies do you use to encode your datasets?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: RSpace users can create or import custom controlled vocabularies/ontologies. Controlled vocabularies/ontologies can be employed as tags on the document level. See: https://documentation.researchspace.com/article/8ujmvpa1no-tagging-documents#controlled_vocabularies_ontologies. Users can also directly use terms from BioPortal ontologies through an integration.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which models, schema(s) do you use for your metadata records?
Which models, schema(s) do you use for your datasets?
Which usage license do you use for your metadata records?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Plan to implement license declarations for RSpace objects, but it would be up to the user to select a given license.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which usage license do you use for your datasets?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: Plan to implement license declarations for RSpace objects, but it would be up to the user to select a given license.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which metadata schemas do you use for describing the provenance of your metadata records?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: RSpace audit trail allows reconstruction of earlier versions. Planned adoption of an interoperable provenance standard.

FIP_maDMP_Mapping.FIP_question: Which metadata schemas do you use for describing the provenance of your datasets?
FIP_maDMP_Mapping.Comments: RSpace audit trail allows reconstruction of earlier versions. Planned adoption of an interoperable provenance standard.
